fitness.CarouselTitle1: The Best Prices for Your Goals
fitness.CarouselText1: Find the best deals tailored to your needs.

section1.title: Finally, a fitness center that isn't overcrowded and offers great options for uninterrupted training
section1.text: Are you tired of overcrowded fitness centers where you can't have an effective workout? Fed up with waiting for equipment because someone is texting? Looking for a place where you can work out without interruptions? MAXXGYM is exactly what you are looking for. It offers an environment for a great workout without unpleasant distractions.

section2.title: Pushing the limits of your abilities
section2.text: At MaxxGym, there is no waiting for equipment or wasting time. We enable more effective training to help you achieve your goals.

section3.title: Equipment that inspires
section3.text: State-of-the-art equipment, top-notch trainers, and motivational programs await you at MaxxGym. Become the best version of yourself!

form.title: Reserve Your Free Ticket
form.description: Avoid common fitness mistakes with our help and try us 100% FREE. Fill out the form below to get your free ticket and visit us as soon as possible.
form.privacy: We respect your privacy and will never share your information with anyone without your consent.

1.title: Still not convinced?
1.text: Best fitness in Ljubljana. Very professional and approachable staff. The owner helps everyone in the gym no matter who you are!
1.author: Klemen Tušek

2.title: The best gym!
2.text: All equipment is always available, clean space, and great atmosphere.
2.author: Ana Novak

3.title: Amazing results!
3.text: In just 3 months, I achieved goals I had dreamed of for years!
3.author: Marko Kovač

4.title: Professional staff!
4.text: The trainers are very friendly and always ready to help.
4.author: Eva Petek

5.title: Highly recommend!
5.text: The best investment I have made for myself!
5.author: Miha Zupan

6.title: Always motivated!
6.text: Training at MaxxGym has become my routine because of the excellent atmosphere.
6.author: Tina Jernej
